meanings.definition: To form or move in a spiral or circular shape.
meanings.sent1: The dancer curlicued gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent2: The wind curlicuing through the trees created a soothing sound.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy curlicued around its owner's legs, seeking attention.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts curlicued around the idea of starting a new hobby.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush curlicuing on the canvas brought the painting to life.

meanings.definition: A decorative curl or twist in writing or design.
meanings.sent1: The invitation had elegant curlicuings on the edges.
meanings.sent2: The old book was adorned with intricate curlicuings on every page.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with curlicuings made of frosting.
meanings.sent4: The wrought iron gate had beautiful curlicuings that added charm to the garden.
meanings.sent5: The calligrapher's pen created perfect curlicuings on the wedding invitations.
